bibl.title: Les ostraca grecs de la Collection Charles Edwin Wilbour au Musée de Brooklyn.
bibl.seg: Préaux Claire, Les ostraca grecs de la Collection Charles Edwin Wilbour au Musée de Brooklyn.
New York, Brooklyn Museum, 1935, 8°, 125 pp. et 2 pll.

C.R. par Harold I. Bell, JEA 23 (1937) pp. 135-137. - Paul Collart, REg 3 (1938) pp. 140-141; REG 49 (1936) p. 477. - Paul Collomp, BFLS 16 (1937) p. 31. - Octave Guéraud, ChrEg 10 (1935) No. 20, pp. 388-392. - Nicolas Hohlwein, AntCl 5 (1936) pp. 226-227. - Naphtali Lewis, Classical Weekly 30 (1937) p. 95. - J.G. Milne, JHS 56 (1936) pp. 151-153. - Willy Peremans, RBPhil 15 (1936) pp. 1055-1059. - Karl Fr.W. Schmidt, PhilWoch 56 (1936) coll. 9-13. - Wilhelm Schubart, OLZ 38 (1935) coll. 483-484.
